short_description: A detailed cross-section view of a female breast, highlighting a Stage II tumor in the upper outer quadrant. The image uses a medical neutral color palette, emphasizing anatomical accuracy and clarity for clinical study.

objects.description: The internal structure of a female breast, meticulously rendered to show various tissue layers including glandular tissue, fatty tissue, and ducts. The cross-section reveals the intricate architecture of the mammary gland.
objects.relationship: The central subject, providing the anatomical context for the tumor.
objects.shape_and_color: Irregular ovoid shape, rendered in muted pinks, creams, and whites with subtle variations in translucency.
objects.texture: Smooth, with implied softness and internal fibrous structures.
objects.appearance_details: Highly detailed anatomical rendering, showing the lobules and ducts with precision.

objects.description: A malignant tumor, approximately 28mm in diameter, positioned within the upper outer quadrant of the breast. It has irregular margins indicative of its invasive nature.
objects.location: upper-right quadrant of the breast cross-section
objects.relationship: Embedded within the breast tissue, representing the primary area of focus.
objects.shape_and_color: Irregular, lobulated mass, depicted in a slightly darker, more opaque shade of purple-grey or reddish-brown to contrast with healthy tissue.
objects.texture: Dense, slightly granular texture, suggesting cellular proliferation.
objects.appearance_details: Clearly demarcated from surrounding healthy tissue, with visible micro-calcifications or spicules extending from its edges, indicating a Stage II malignancy.

background_setting: A sterile, clean white background, free of distractions, designed to highlight the anatomical subject without any contextual elements.

lighting.direction: Evenly distributed from multiple angles, minimizing harsh shadows
lighting.shadows: Minimal and very soft, primarily cast by internal structures to provide subtle depth.

aesthetics.composition: Centered, orthographic projection, emphasizing clarity and scientific accuracy.
aesthetics.color_scheme: Medical neutral palette, featuring muted pinks, creams, and subtle purples/reds for pathological areas, ensuring high contrast for diagnostic features.

photographic_characteristics.depth_of_field: Deep, ensuring all elements of the cross-section are in sharp focus.
photographic_characteristics.focus: Sharp focus on all anatomical and pathological details.
photographic_characteristics.camera_angle: Orthographic (straight-on view, removing perspective distortion), with a slight tilt to reveal internal contours.
photographic_characteristics.lens_focal_length: Standard lens (e.g., 50mm equivalent) for a realistic, undistorted view.

context: This is a scientific visualization or medical illustration, likely intended for educational purposes, diagnostic training, or medical research, focusing on breast cancer pathology.
